channel.title: Mob spawners
channel.description:
Once griefed and rolled back they don't work again :(
Is there anything we can do about this configuration wise? Or possible install another plugin that can make the spawners spawn specific monsters (I'm sure one exists).
e.g. http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/misc-mech-mob-spawner-changer-v0-3-change-what-a-mob-spawner-spawns-1337.26038/
Gravel_Boy just griefed my spawners across W1 and now they don't work, and set my W2 house on fire and when I gave him a chance to fix it before I gave him to harshest punishment known to man he put FAG on my roof in wood letters.
We won't be seeing him again. Fuscate also had this issue, so what do we think?

item.title: Mob spawners
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Phaze One:

Need to bump this- drubrkletern had his silverfish spawner destroyed and consequently it doesn’t work anymore. Can silverfish be added to the command?

might as well add blaze too

item.title: Mob spawners
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Ok, you now have these permissions (all mods):

    - essentials.spawner
    - essentials.spawner.skeleton
    - essentials.spawner.zombie
    - essentials.spawner.spider
    - essentials.spawner.cavespider

Read full topic

item.title: Mob spawners
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Zombie, spider, cave spider, skeleton.

and creeper

Read full topic

item.title: Mob spawners
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

zuppers:

One of the bukkit essentials has a command to change the spawners type don’t remember what it was.

Great call!

General spawner Change the mob type of a spawner / Instructions: This command allows you to modify the types of mobs spawned from an preexisting mob spawner. Permissions: essentials.spawner Allow access to the /spawner command. essentials.spawner.[mob] Allows access to spawn a specific mob essentials.spawner.* Allows the spawning of all mobs

So, what types of spawners exist naturally so I know what permissions to give? Also, just to admins, or to all staff?

Read full topic

item.title: Mob spawners
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I think two, if we’re lucky I might be testing the other one wrong so might work but I doubt it.

Don’t worry, I made him pay the highest price punishment wise. This is the 3rd time he’s done something like this - Our mine has massive pits everywhere as well with lava due to him. I’m gonna make sure nobody has to deal with these idiots again.

I probably would have understood some of his logic if he was a pvp enemy, looking for quick revenge, but I don’t even know these people

Read full topic
